Fs_rootdir Union Reference

#include <fat.h>

Detailed Description

Union to define a root directory.

Definition at line 246 of file fat.h.

Data Fields

   U16   u16_pos
 Offset between the beginning of FAT and the beginning of root dir (unit sector).
   U16   u16_size
 size of root (unit sector)
} seg
 For FAT 12 & 16, it is a segment.
U32 u32_cluster
 For FAT32, the root directory is a listing of cluster.
